name: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner using the clinic API
scenarioId: classpath:features/owners/manage_owners:the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner using the clinic API
methodName: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner using the clinic API

testSteps.description: When Ricardo sends a request to see all the information of  the owner with ID 1 using the clinic API

children.description: Ricardo executes a GET on the resource /owners/{ownerId}

restQuery.responseHeaders:
vary: accept-encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Mon, 16 Sep 2024 08:51:26 GMT

testSteps.description: Then the system should return a 200 response code

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the response status should be (200)

testSteps.description: And the response body should include all the registered information of the owner including the pets and visits

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the owner in the latest api response should contain the information of George Franklin

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the owners information
  In order to handle all the pets and visits made by them

title: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner using the clinic API

rule.name: The system should allow to access the personal information of an owner
